title: Long Shadows at Golden Hour
description: A micro-lesson that makes Long Shadows at Golden Hour usable.

hook.text: When the sun is low, shadows stretch impossibly long. A person casts a thirty-foot shadow across the ground.

discovery.text: Long shadows add depth and dimension to flat surfaces like beaches, fields, and city streets.

twist.text: Sometimes the shadow is the composition. An aerial shot of long shadows from tiny figures can be pure graphic art.

punchline.text: Short sun, long shadows, great photos.
